trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> objects that make up a row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 封装的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>构成了中的行的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects that make up a row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于以编程方式管理集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>构成了中的行的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: This class is commonly used to add or remove cells from a row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 此类通常用于添加或删除某行中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> collection that represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A>表示的集合的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> represents an individual row in the table and contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> collection that represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>表示表中的单个行，并包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>表示的集合的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects represent the individual cells in the table.
trans-unit.target: 这些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象表示表中的各个单元格。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: To get an individual cell, you must first get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取各个单元格，必须先获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: You can then get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以然后获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>的集合</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 追加指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>到末尾<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> to the end of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法将添加指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>到的一种<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>末尾</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref>要添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 索引数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref> at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>中指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来插入指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>的指定索引处。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: The location in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref> at which to add the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>在其中添加<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Appends the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> objects from the specified array to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 追加<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>来自指定数组到集合末尾的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the AddRange method to append the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects from the specified array to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在 AddRange 方法用于追加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>来自指定数组到集合的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you are constructing a row of a table.
trans-unit.target: 当你在构造表的一行，通常使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To construct a row of a table, first create an array of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to represent the cells of the row.
trans-unit.target: 若要构造表的一行，请先创建的数组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来表示的行单元格。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: Next, use the AddRange method, passing the array as an argument, to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用在 AddRange 方法，将数组传递作为自变量，将添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>到集合的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: The array containing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该数组包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>要添加到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: The value of the cells parameter is .
trans-unit.target: 值 cells 参数是 。

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中删除所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>对象从<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Count%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于删除所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>并设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Count%2A>属性设为 0。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method removes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>, but it does not remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此方法可以删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>，但它不会删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: Be sure to also remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> if you want to completely remove a row from the table.
trans-unit.target: 请确保也会删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>如果想要从表中完全删除行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting with the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 从项复制<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>到指定<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>与中的指定索引开始， <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法的内容复制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>到指定<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>指定索引处开始。</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;>`array`参数必须从零开始的<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>接收复制的项从<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 在指定的第一个索引<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>中接收项。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the number of cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The Count property is often used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound.
trans-unit.target: Count 属性通常用于循环访问集合时确定的上边界。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，表示指定的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>从<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来确定指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>索引

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> is not found, an index of -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>是未找到，则返回-1 索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref>若要获取其索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>内<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that a match has not been found.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，指示未找到匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>实现对象，其中包含所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法创建的<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>实现，可以循环访问轻松地为获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>中的每个项的对象</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性当前获取的项集合中指向。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法将移动到集合中的下一项。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator back to the initial position.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法将枚举器移回初始位置。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method must be called after creating a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object or after using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法必须在创建之后调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>实现对象或之后使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法将枚举器移动到集合中的第一项。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 否则，表示的项<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是不确定。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> objects within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection> can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回`false`，则指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>可以在所有情况下写入到。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCellCollection>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>所有用例。

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性派生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>和重写以始终返回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>
